channel.title: In-game NPC text help
channel.description:
Well, i have been wondering for a while now and never been able to figure it out. How do you make an NPC say something and is there a way to change what they say? and to get them to say like "i 0wnag3 i is offline/online" and "the server owner is i 0wnag3 i" "co owner is..." etc
i wanted to put: the server owner is i 0wnag3 i I 0wnag3 I is (online/offline)
Also, its a bit off topic but, how do i take all weather off?
thanks.

item.title: In-game NPC text help
item.dc:creator: @bib bib
item.description:
@bib wrote:

this is done in npchandler.java tell me what you want to add and what you want it to say and ill tell you what to put in the npchandler.java

Read full topic

item.title: In-game NPC text help
item.dc:creator: @moparscape_is_the_be moparscape--is--the--best
item.description:
@moparscape_is_the_be wrote:

Well, i have been wondering for a while now and never been able to figure it out. How do you make an NPC say something and is there a way to change what they say? and to get them to say like “i 0wnag3 i is offline/online” and “the server owner is i 0wnag3 i” “co owner is…” etc

i wanted to put:
the server owner is i 0wnag3 i
I 0wnag3 I is (online/offline)

Also, its a bit off topic but, how do i take all weather off?

thanks.

Read full topic
